channel.title: Need pickup command
channel.description: i need the pickup command for silabs items.. ;D

item.title: Need pickup command
item.dc:creator: @gign919191 gign919191
item.description:
@gign919191 wrote:

Well, as much as i know, you cant use pickup with normal items and silab at same time…

so heres the code for silabs only (Item ID 10000+):

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerRights >= 2)) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,12)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13)); if (newItemID <= 20000 && newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("Wrong Item ID!"); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Type it right! "); } }

Read full topic
